languages.text: "Гапраки происходят с отдаленного мира-кузни — среди их дальних родственников немало служителей Омниссии, да и сам род близок к культу Адептус Механикус — и по духу, и по деловым связям. Гапраки обеспечивали индустриальные поставки в вашем протекторате — до недавних пор. С тех пор, как прервалась астропатическая связь с миром Кьява Гамма, они весьма обеспокоены сохранностью вверенной в их управление планетой".

traits.locale_text: "Гапраки происходят с отдаленного мира-кузни — среди ихз дальних родственников немало служителей Омниссии, да и сам род близок к культу Адептус Механикус — и по духу, и по деловым связям. Гапраки обеспечивали индустриальные поставки в вашей торговой империи — до недавних пор. С тех пор, как прервалась астропатическая связь с миром Кьява Гамма, они весьма обеспокоены сохранностью вверенной в их управление планетой".

languages.text: "The Gapraks hail from a remote forge world, and among their distant relatives, there are many servants of the Omnissiah, and the house itself is close to the cult of the Adeptus Mechanicus, both in spirit and in their business connections. The Gapraks oversaw the industrial shipments within your protectorate — until recently. Ever since the Astropathic communication with Kiava Gamma was severed, they've been quite concerned about the security of the planet placed in their care."
languages.original_text: "Гапраки происходят с отдаленного мира-кузни — среди их дальних родственников немало служителей Омниссии, да и сам род близок к культу Адептус Механикус — и по духу, и по деловым связям. Гапраки обеспечивали индустриальные поставки в вашем протекторате — до недавних пор. С тех пор, как прервалась астропатическая связь с миром Кьява Гамма, они весьма обеспокоены сохранностью вверенной в их управление планетой".

traits.locale_text: "The Gapraks hail from a remote factory world, and among their distant relatives, there are many servants of the Omnissiah, and the house itself is close to the cult of the Adeptus Mechanicus, both in spirit and in their business connections. The Gapraks oversaw the industrial shipments within your trade empire — until recently. Ever since the Astropathic communication with Kiava Gamma was severed, they've been quite worried about the safety of the planet placed in their care."

Ever since the Astropathic communication with Kiava Gamma was severed, they've been quite worried about the safety of the planet placed in their care."

Ever since the Astropathic communication with Kiava Gamma was severed, they've been quite concerned about the security of the planet placed in their care."

languages.text: “贾帕克家族来自遥远的铸造世界。他们的远房亲戚之中，有许多人是欧姆尼塞亚的仆人，而且这个家族本身也与机械修会的信徒保持着密切联系，无论是信仰方面，还是商业方面。贾帕克家族监督着您的王朝所有与工业相关的运输事宜。但最近，我们与基亚瓦伽马星星语者的通讯被切断了，他们相当担心他们管辖的这颗行星是不是出了安全问题。”
languages.original_text: "The Gapraks hail from a remote forge world, and among their distant relatives, there are many servants of the Omnissiah, and the house itself is close to the cult of the Adeptus Mechanicus, both in spirit and in their business connections. The Gapraks oversaw the industrial shipments within your protectorate — until recently. Ever since the Astropathic communication with Kiava Gamma was severed, they've been quite concerned about the security of the planet placed in their care."

traits.locale_text: “贾帕克家族来自遥远的铸造世界。他们的远房亲戚之中，有许多人是欧姆尼塞亚的仆人，而且这个家族本身也与机械修会的信徒保持着密切联系，无论是信仰方面，还是商业方面。贾帕克家族监督着您的王朝所有与工业相关的运输事宜。但最近，我们与基亚瓦伽马星星语者的通讯被切断了，他们相当担心他们管辖的这颗行星是不是出了安全问题。”

languages.text: «Los Gaprak provienen de un mundo forja remoto y muchos de sus parientes están al servicio del Omnissiah. La casa entera tiene una relación estrecha con el culto del Adeptus Mechanicus, tanto en lo espiritual como en lo financiero. Los Gaprak supervisaban los cargamentos industriales en su protectorado hasta hace poco. Desde que la comunicación mediante astrópatas con Kiava Gamma se ha interrumpido, están preocupados por la seguridad del planeta que tienen a cargo».
languages.original_text: "The Gapraks hail from a remote forge world, and among their distant relatives, there are many servants of the Omnissiah, and the house itself is close to the cult of the Adeptus Mechanicus, both in spirit and in their business connections. The Gapraks oversaw the industrial shipments within your protectorate — until recently. Ever since the Astropathic communication with Kiava Gamma was severed, they've been quite concerned about the security of the planet placed in their care."

traits.locale_text: «Los Gaprak provienen de un mundo forja remoto y muchos de sus parientes están al servicio del Omnissiah. La casa entera tiene una relación estrecha con el culto del Adeptus Mechanicus, tanto en lo espiritual como en lo financiero. Los Gaprak supervisaban los cargamentos industriales en su protectorado hasta hace poco. Desde que la comunicación mediante astrópatas con Kiava Gamma se ha interrumpido, están preocupados por la seguridad del planeta que tienen a cargo».

languages.text: 「ギャプラック家は遠い工業惑星の出身です。遠い親戚たちの中でも万機神の従者を数多く抱えており、家として精神的にも商業的にも帝国技術局の一団と密接な関係があります。ギャプラック家は陛下の保護領で産業船の監督をしていました―最近までは。感応通信官が担当していたキアヴァ・ガンマとの通信が途絶えてからずっと、ギャプラック家は彼らが世話する惑星の安全保障について、大いに心配しています」
languages.original_text: "The Gapraks hail from a remote forge world, and among their distant relatives, there are many servants of the Omnissiah, and the house itself is close to the cult of the Adeptus Mechanicus, both in spirit and in their business connections. The Gapraks oversaw the industrial shipments within your protectorate — until recently. Ever since the Astropathic communication with Kiava Gamma was severed, they've been quite concerned about the security of the planet placed in their care."

traits.locale_text: 「ギャプラック家は遠い工業惑星の出身です。遠い親戚たちの中でも万機神の従者を数多く抱えており、家として精神的にも商業的にも帝国技術局の一団と密接な関係があります。ギャプラック家は陛下の保護領で産業船の監督をしていました―最近までは。感応通信官が担当していたキアヴァ・ガンマとの通信が途絶えてからずっと、ギャプラック家は彼らが世話する惑星の安全保障について、大いに心配しています」

languages.text: "Die Gapraks stammen von einer abgelegenen Fabrikwelt und haben unter ihren entfernten Verwandten zahlreiche Diener des Omnissiah. Das Haus selbst steht einem Kult des Adeptus Mechanicus nahe, sowohl spirituell als auch geschäftlich. Die Familie führte die Industrielieferungen in Eurem Protektorat durch – bis vor Kurzem. Seit dem Zusammenbruch der Astropathen-Kommunikation mit Kiava Gamma sind sie ziemlich besorgt um die Sicherheit des ihnen anvertrauten Planeten."
languages.original_text: "The Gapraks hail from a remote forge world, and among their distant relatives, there are many servants of the Omnissiah, and the house itself is close to the cult of the Adeptus Mechanicus, both in spirit and in their business connections. The Gapraks oversaw the industrial shipments within your protectorate — until recently. Ever since the Astropathic communication with Kiava Gamma was severed, they've been quite concerned about the security of the planet placed in their care."

traits.locale_text: "Die Gapraks stammen von einer abgelegenen Fabrikwelt und haben unter ihren entfernten Verwandten zahlreiche Diener des Omnissiah. Das Haus selbst steht einem Kult des Adeptus Mechanicus nahe, sowohl spirituell als auch geschäftlich. Die Familie führte die Industrielieferungen in Eurem Protektorat durch – bis vor Kurzem. Seit dem Zusammenbruch der Astropathen-Kommunikation mit Kiava Gamma sind sie ziemlich besorgt um die Sicherheit des ihnen anvertrauten Planeten."

languages.text: « Les Gaprak sont originaires d'un lointain monde forge. Nombre de leurs ancêtres étaient au service de l'Omnimessie, et leur maison elle-même est proche du culte de l'Adeptus Mechanicus. Pas seulement en termes spirituels, mais également commerciaux. Jusqu'à récemment, les Gaprak supervisaient les transports industriels au sein de votre protectorat, mais depuis la rupture des communications astropathiques avec Kiava Gamma, ils s'inquiètent de la sécurité de la planète placée sous leur responsabilité. »
languages.original_text: "The Gapraks hail from a remote forge world, and among their distant relatives, there are many servants of the Omnissiah, and the house itself is close to the cult of the Adeptus Mechanicus, both in spirit and in their business connections. The Gapraks oversaw the industrial shipments within your protectorate — until recently. Ever since the Astropathic communication with Kiava Gamma was severed, they've been quite concerned about the security of the planet placed in their care."

traits.locale_text: « Les Gaprak sont originaires d'un lointain monde forge. Nombre de leurs ancêtres étaient au service de l'Omnimessie, et leur maison elle-même est proche du culte de l'Adeptus Mechanicus. Pas seulement en termes spirituels, mais également commerciaux. Jusqu'à récemment, les Gaprak supervisaient les transports industriels au sein de votre protectorat, mais depuis la rupture des communications astropathiques avec Kiava Gamma, ils s'inquiètent de la sécurité de la planète placée sous leur responsabilité. »

languages.text: "Gapraklar, uzak bir döküm dünyasından gelmiş olup uzak akrabaları arasında birçok Hermesih hizmetkârı bulunmaktadır. Hanenin kendisi de Adeptus Mechanicus tarikatına ile hem ruhen hem de iş bağlantıları açısından yakındır. Gapraklar, yakın zamana dek protektoranızdaki endüstriyel nakliyatlardan sorumluydu. Kiava Gama ile olan Astropatik bağlantı kesildiğinden beri himayeleri altındaki gezegenin güvenliğinden epey endişe duyuyorlar."
languages.original_text: "The Gapraks hail from a remote forge world, and among their distant relatives, there are many servants of the Omnissiah, and the house itself is close to the cult of the Adeptus Mechanicus, both in spirit and in their business connections. The Gapraks oversaw the industrial shipments within your protectorate — until recently. Ever since the Astropathic communication with Kiava Gamma was severed, they've been quite concerned about the security of the planet placed in their care."

traits.locale_text: "Gapraklar uzak bir döküm dünyasından gelmişlerdir ve uzak akrabaları arasında birçok Hermesih hizmetkârı bulunmaktadır. Hanenin kendisi de Adeptus Mechanicus kültü ile hem ruhen hem de iş bağlantıları açısından yakın durumdadır. Gapraklar protektoranızdaki endüstriyel nakliyatları düzenlemekteydiler. Yakın zamana kadar. Kiava Gama ile olan Astropatik bağlantı kesildiğinden beri himayeleri altındaki gezegenin güvenliği konusunca ciddi endişe içindeler."
